message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

The paper deals with the task of driver attention monitoring, which involves computer vision and robotics. The proposed method uses deep learning and convolutional neural networks for head pose estimation on depth images, which falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also mentions the use of the proposed method in an automotive setup, which suggests robotics (cs.RO) as another likely category. The use of deep learning and neural networks also suggests machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as possible categories. Finally, the paper mentions the use of face reconstruction, which falls under multimedia (cs.MM).
